features.name: Main Window UI
steps: Launch desktop app → Main window displays with title 'Session Recorder'
Recording title input field is visible and accepts text
Recording mode has 3 options: 'Browser Only', 'Voice Only', 'Browser + Voice'
Select 'Browser + Voice' mode → Mode button shows selected state
Browser dropdown shows at least 'Chromium' option
Start URL input accepts 'https://example.com'
Start Recording button is visible and enabled
Status bar shows 'Ready to record' text

features.name: Recording Controls Flow
steps: Click Start Recording → Browser window opens within 3 seconds
Main window transitions to 'Recording Active' state
Timer displays and increments every second (format: 00:00:00)
Action count increments when clicking in browser
Voice level indicator shows activity when speaking
Current URL updates as browser navigates
Stop Recording button is visible and enabled

features.name: Recording Status View
steps: During recording → Recording indicator shows red dot
Timer shows elapsed time in HH:MM:SS format
Actions counter shows 'N actions' label
Voice indicator shows audio level bars when microphone active
URL display shows current page URL (truncated if needed)
Tips section shows helpful guidance text
Window title bar shows 'Recording' state indicator

features.name: Recording Complete View
steps: Click Stop Recording → Processing indicator appears
After processing → 'Recording Complete' view displays
Summary shows duration (e.g., '5 minutes, 23 seconds')
Summary shows action count (e.g., '47 browser actions')
Summary shows voice segments if voice recording was enabled
File path displays the saved zip location
'Open in Viewer' button is visible and clickable
'Show in Folder' button is visible and clickable
'New Recording' button returns to idle state

features.name: Recent Recordings Panel
steps: Recent Recordings section visible on main window
After completing a recording → New entry appears in list
Each entry shows title (or default name), date, duration
Each entry shows action count
Click entry → Context menu or buttons for Open/Delete/Show
Click 'Open in Viewer' → Viewer launches with that recording
Click 'Show in Folder' → File explorer opens to zip location
Click 'Delete' → Confirmation dialog appears → Confirm deletes file

features.name: Settings Dialog
steps: Click settings icon → Settings dialog opens
Output Directory field shows current path with Browse button
Click Browse → Native folder picker opens
Default Browser dropdown shows available browsers
Whisper Model dropdown shows: Tiny, Base, Small, Medium
'Start minimized to system tray' checkbox is functional
'Show notification on recording complete' checkbox is functional
'Auto-open viewer after recording' checkbox is functional
Click Save → Settings persist after app restart
Click Cancel → Changes are discarded

features.name: System Tray Integration
steps: App minimized → System tray icon appears
Right-click tray icon → Context menu displays
Menu shows 'Quick Record (Browser)' option
Menu shows 'Quick Record (Combined)' option
Click 'Quick Record (Combined)' → Browser opens and recording starts
Menu shows 'Open Recordings Folder' option → Opens folder
Menu shows 'Open Viewer' option → Launches viewer
Menu shows 'Settings' option → Opens settings dialog
Menu shows 'Quit' option → App exits completely

features.name: Cross-Platform Builds
steps: Run Windows build → NSIS installer created in dist/
Run Windows build → Portable exe created
Run macOS build → DMG file created
Run Linux build → AppImage created
Run Linux build → DEB package created
Install on Windows → App runs without errors
Install on macOS → App runs without errors
Install on Linux (AppImage) → App runs without errors
